title: Damn Am Costa Mesa 2013 Day One - SPoT Life
description: Travel the world with the infamous Skatepark of Tampa crew as they host events, contests, and more with today's top professional skateboarders. Check in with SPoT Life and SPoT Life Event Checks following major events in the world of skateboarding for a look behind-the-scenes.

asset.author: Volcom
asset.hookText:
Travel the world with the infamous Skatepark of Tampa crew as they host events, contests, and more with today's top professional skateboarders. Check in with SPoT Life and SPoT Life Event Checks following major events in the world of skateboarding for a look behind-the-scenes.
